frame_eqs_str:
m.wave_r=(0.5+(0.5*Math.sin((1.6*m.time)))); m.wave_g=(0.5+(0.5*Math.sin((4.1*m.time)))); m.wave_b=(-1+(((1-m.wave_r)+1)-m.wave_g)); m.warp=0; m.pfthresh=((above(m.bass_att, m.pfthresh)*2)+((1-above(m.bass_att, m.pfthresh))*(((m.pfthresh-1.3)*0.96)+1.3))); m.pfdx_r=(((equal(m.pfthresh, 2)*0.015)*Math.sin((5*m.time)))+((1-equal(m.pfthresh, 2))*m.pfdx_r)); m.pfdy_r=(((equal(m.pfthresh, 2)*0.015)*Math.sin((6*m.time)))+((1-equal(m.pfthresh, 2))*m.pfdy_r)); m.rg1=Math.abs(Math.sin(m.time)); m.rg2=((1*above(m.rg1, 0.5))+((0*m.pfdy_r)*below(m.rg1, 0.5))); m.rg3=((equal(m.pfthresh, 2)!=0)?(m.rg2):(m.rg3)); m.q1=m.wave_r; m.q2=m.wave_g; m.q3=m.wave_b; m.wave_additive=m.rg3; m.ob_r=m.q1; m.ob_g=m.q2; m.ob_b=m.q3;
		m.rkeys = ['thresh','dx_r','dy_r','tg3','zoom'];
pixel_eqs_str: m.thresh=((above(m.bass_att, m.thresh)*2)+((1-above(m.bass_att, m.thresh))*(((m.thresh-1.3)*0.96)+1.3))); m.dx_r=(((equal(m.thresh, 2)*0.015)*Math.sin((5*m.time)))+((1-equal(m.thresh, 2))*m.dx_r)); m.dy_r=(((equal(m.thresh, 2)*0.015)*Math.sin((6*m.time)))+((1-equal(m.thresh, 2))*m.dy_r)); m.tg1=Math.abs(Math.sin(m.time)); m.tg2=((0.3*above(m.tg1, 0.5))+(0.1*below(m.tg1, 0.5))); m.tg3=((equal(m.thresh, 2)!=0)?(m.tg2):(m.tg3)); m.zoom=(m.zoom-((2*m.tg3)*Math.sin((((2.4*m.bass)*(1-(m.x*Math.sin(m.time))))*((2.4*m.treb)*(1-(m.y*Math.cos(m.time)))))))); m.zoom=(m.zoom+0.07);
